title: (x) "Dream Registry" geometric sans - Neutraface {Sebastian}
content:
Can anybody tell me what font this is or one similar to it? Thanks a lot!

author: bullmoose8

comments.content: Looks like House’s Neutraface, probably Text Bold.
It’s more than just looks, it IS Neutraface!
Andrew, at 11pm I like being vague.
